verses.verse: Then <S%G1899><s%> after <S%G1223><s%> an interval of fourteen <S%G1180><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> I went <S%G305><s%> up again <S%G3825><s%> to Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> with Barnabas, <S%G921><s%> taking <S%G4838><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> along <S%G4838><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

And it was because <S%G2596><s%> of a revelation <S%G602><s%> that I went <S%G305><s%> up; and I submitted <S%G394><s%> to them the gospel <S%G2098><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I preach <S%G2784><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> but [I did so] in private <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who were of reputation, <S%G1380><s%> for fear <S%G3381><s%> that I might be running, <S%G5143><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> had run, <S%G5143><s%> in vain. <S%G2756><s%>
But not even <S%G3761><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> was with me, though he was a Greek, <S%G1672><s%> was compelled <S%G315><s%> to be circumcised. <S%G4059><s%>

But [it was] because <S%G1223><s%> of the false <S%G5569><s%> brethren <S%G5569><s%> who had sneaked <S%G3920><s%> in to spy <S%G2684><s%> out our liberty <S%G1657><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> to bring <S%G2615><s%> us into bondage. <S%G2615><s%>

But we did not yield <S%G1502><s%> in subjection <S%G5292><s%> to them for even <S%G3761><s%> an hour, <S%G5610><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that the truth <S%G225><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> might remain <S%G1265><s%> with you.

But from those <S%G3588><s%> who were of high <S%G5100><s%> reputation <S%G1380><s%> (what <S%G3697><s%> they were makes <S%G1308><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> difference <S%G1308><s%> to me; God <S%G2316><s%> shows <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> partiality <S%G4383><s%>) – well, <S%G1063><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who were of reputation <S%G1380><s%> contributed <S%G4323><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> to me.

But on the contrary, <S%G5121><s%> seeing <S%G3708><s%> that I had been entrusted <S%G4100><s%> with the gospel <S%G2098><s%> to the uncircumcised, <S%G203><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as Peter <S%G4074><s%> [had been] to the circumcised <S%G4061><s%>

(for He who effectually <S%G1754><s%> worked <S%G1754><s%> for Peter <S%G4074><s%> in [his] apostleship <S%G651><s%> to the circumcised <S%G4061><s%> effectually <S%G1754><s%> worked <S%G1754><s%> for me also <S%G2532><s%> to the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>),

and recognizing <S%G1097><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> that had been given <S%G1325><s%> to me, James <S%G2385><s%> and Cephas <S%G2786><s%> and John, <S%G2491><s%> who were reputed <S%G1380><s%> to be pillars, <S%G4769><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to me and Barnabas <S%G921><s%> the right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G1188><s%> of fellowship, <S%G2842><s%> that we [might go] to the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> and they to the circumcised. <S%G4061><s%>
[They] only <S%G3440><s%> [asked] us to remember <S%G3421><s%> the poor <S%G4434><s%> – the very <S%G846><s%> thing <S%G846><s%> I also <S%G2532><s%> was eager <S%G4704><s%> to do. <S%G4160><s%>
But when <S%G3753><s%> Cephas <S%G2786><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to Antioch, <S%G490><s%> I opposed <S%G436><s%> him to his face, <S%G4383><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he stood condemned. <S%G2607><s%>

For prior <S%G4253><s%> to the coming <S%G2064><s%> of certain <S%G5100><s%> men <S%G5100><s%> from James, <S%G2385><s%> he used to eat <S%G4906><s%> with the Gentiles; <S%G1484><s%> but when <S%G3753><s%> they came, <S%G2064><s%> he [began] to withdraw <S%G5288><s%> and hold <S%G873><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> aloof, <S%G873><s%> fearing <S%G5399><s%> the party of the circumcision. <S%G4061><s%>

And the rest <S%G3062><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> joined <S%G4942><s%> him in hypocrisy, <S%G4942><s%> with the result <S%G5620><s%> that even <S%G2532><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> was carried <S%G4879><s%> away <S%G4879><s%> by their hypocrisy. <S%G5272><s%>

But when <S%G3753><s%> I saw <S%G3708><s%> that they were not straightforward <S%G3716><s%> about <S%G4314><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> of the gospel, <S%G2098><s%> I said <S%G3004><s%> to Cephas <S%G2786><s%> in the presence <S%G1715><s%> of all, <S%G3956><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> you, being <S%G5225><s%> a Jew, <S%G2453><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> like <S%G1483><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1483><s%> and not like <S%G2452><s%> the Jews, <S%G2452><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> [is it that] you compel <S%G315><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> to live <S%G2450><s%> like <S%G2450><s%> Jews <S%G2450><s%>?
"We [are] Jews <S%G2453><s%> by nature, <S%G5449><s%> and not sinners <S%G268><s%> from among <S%G1537><s%> the Gentiles; <S%G1484><s%>

nevertheless <S%G1161><s%> knowing <S%G3609><s%> that a man <S%G444><s%> is not justified <S%G1344><s%> by the works <S%G2041><s%> of the Law <S%G3551><s%> but through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> we have believed <S%G4100><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> that we may be justified <S%G1344><s%> by faith <S%G4102><s%> in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and not by the works <S%G2041><s%> of the Law; <S%G3551><s%> since <S%G3754><s%> by the works <S%G2041><s%> of the Law <S%G3551><s%> shall no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> be justified. <S%G1344><s%>

"But if, <S%G1487><s%> while seeking <S%G2212><s%> to be justified <S%G1344><s%> in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> we ourselves <S%G846><s%> have also <S%G2532><s%> been found <S%G2147><s%> sinners, <S%G268><s%> is Christ <S%G5547><s%> then <S%G686><s%> a minister <S%G1249><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%>? May it never <S%G3361><s%> be!
"For if <S%G1487><s%> I rebuild <S%G3618><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I have [once] destroyed, <S%G2647><s%> I prove <S%G4921><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> to be a transgressor. <S%G3848><s%>
"For through <S%G1223><s%> the Law <S%G3551><s%> I died <S%G599><s%> to the Law, <S%G3551><s%> that I might live <S%G2198><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

"I have been crucified <S%G4957><s%> with Christ; <S%G5547><s%> and it is no <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G3765><s%> I who live, <S%G2198><s%> but Christ <S%G5547><s%> lives <S%G2198><s%> in me; and the [life] which <S%G3739><s%> I now <S%G3568><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> in the flesh <S%G4561><s%> I live <S%G2198><s%> by faith <S%G4102><s%> in the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> who loved <S%G25><s%> me, and delivered <S%G3860><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> up for me.

"I do not nullify <S%G114><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> for if <S%G1487><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> [comes] through <S%G1223><s%> the Law, <S%G3551><s%> then <S%G686><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died <S%G599><s%> needlessly. <S%G1431><s%>"
